_sText:
THIS IS THE UPDATE FROM V2_3
============================
	 Old version is HERE : http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/174082

> - Delete some spawns in the map
> - Change cliff in the third level
> - Skull is now a weapon
> - Final fight : human can now climb to be safe
> - New sound in the temple
> - If jones die during normal difficulty the round continue but if jones die during xtrem difficulty human will dead
> - Level 2 : A human who fall from truck will be teleported to zombies truck
> - Some others minor bug fixed (like console message or glich)

I would like to thank everyone who helped me to solve the problems
------------------------------------------------------------------

	>>>Update from v2_3

> - You can most easily leave the truck (human are not stuck)
> - Level 3 : Zombie teleport after the cliff is slower. Humans now cover the time to get in the temple
> - Boss don't kill with one shoot but 2 or 3 hurts
> - Console messages corrected

### with several corrections the map is now playable at 100%. We played with 30 players and we arrived in extreme, level 3, but have not been able to make the Boss ^^. Thanks you for playing
